subject: Regarding THC Regulation in Texas
body:
Dear Representative {repName},

My name is {userName}, and I am a constituent from {userLocation}. I am writing to you today to express my views on the regulation of THC products in our state.

I believe that with sensible regulation, we can ensure the safety of consumers while allowing a thriving industry to continue to provide jobs and economic benefits to Texans.

Thank you for your time and consideration of this important matter.

Sincerely,
{userName}
